maha margaye siduwana hadisi anathurakadi oba ho obe gnyathiwarayek anathurakata lakwi wahanaya handunaganimata nohaki wuwath ee wenuwen prawahana amathyanshayen wandiyak labaganimata dan awasthawa salasi atha.me anuwa miyagiya ayaku wenuwen rupiyal lakshayaka mudalakda, barapathala thuwala labu ayaku wenuwen rupiyal 75,000ka mudalak da himi wana bawa prawahana amathyanshaye marga aarakshawa pilibanda jathika sabhawa kiyayi.me sandaha wu illum path siyaluma polis sthanawalin da pradeshiya lekam karyalawalin ha marga aarakshawa pilibanda jathika sabhawen da labagatha haki we.sampurna karana lada illum path lekam, marga aarakshawa pilibanda jathika sabhawa, prawahana amathyanshaya, anka 1, di.aar.wijewardhana mawatha, kolambaa 10 yana lipinayata yomu kala yuthu we.

unta hodanam apita panda???kawuruwath othanata balen adagena gihilla nane,kawuruth kamaththenne yanne,ithin monawa karagaththama apita mokada?anith athata lankawe thibba lingika nidahasa nathiwuneth suddonge kalen passe,man me lingika nidahasa kiwwe heluwen pare bahala yana ekawath,prasiddiye sansargaye yedebana ekawath neme.issara minissunta ganunta thaman kamathi eekath ekka kamathinam witharak idala akamathinam wenwela yahathin inna puluwan kamak thibunane.dan ithin pothe liwwe nathuwa wade kaloth un saththu widihata thamayi samajaya dakinne,anith eka mewa rajakale idala thibba de nowa.
